`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"night-owl",children:"use-media-query.tsx"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"F:\\startup\\ui-layout-lib\\project\\newone\\ui-layout\\apps\\web\\src\\content\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-655076ec-f2da-4517-9751-a4e72ebd7b27.mdx"},this),(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#011627",color:"#d6deeb"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"night-owl",__rawString__:`import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'\r
\r
export function useMediaQuery(query: string) {\r
  const [value, setValue] = useState(false)\r
\r
  useEffect(() => {\r
    function onChange(event: MediaQueryListEvent) {\r
      setValue(event.matches)\r
    }\r
\r
    const result = matchMedia(query)\r
    result.addEventListener('change', onChange)\r
    setValue(result.matches)\r
\r
    return () => result.removeEventListener('change', onChange)\r
  }, [query])\r
\r
  return value\r
}
